00001 #ifndef DEVTAG_H
00002 #define DEVTAG_H
00003 
00004 #include <sys/types.h>
00005 
00006 /*
00007  * Lookup 'devtag' among the predefined device selections.
00008  * If a matching device is found return the name of this device in buf.
00009  *
00010  * If 'devtag' is prefixed with "/dev/" then the result is also
00011  * prefixed with "/dev/".
00012  *
00013  * Returns number of devices found or a negative value if an error occured.
00014  */
00015 int devtag_lookup(char *buf, size_t bufsize, const char *devtag);
00016 
00017 /* also returns a constant name if supplied in the configuration */
00018 int devtag_lookup2(char *buf, size_t bufsize, char *constbuf, size_t constsize, const char *devtag);
00019 
00020 /*
00021  * Simple lookup.
00022  * Returns a suitable replacement for devtag.
00023  * If no replacement can be determined a 'devtag' will be returned as a duplicated string.
00024  */
00025 char *devtag_get(const char *devtag);
00026 
00027 #endif
00028 #ifndef LIBDEVTAG_H
00029 #define LIBDEVTAG_H

00031 #define LIBDEVTAG_VERSION "1.0.6"

00059   struct dev *head;

00062 struct dev {
00063   struct devinfo_head info;
00064   struct devname_head devnames;
00065   char *class; /* "usb", "pci" etc */
00066   struct dev *next;
00067 };
00068 
00069 /*
00070  * Find devices matching selections in list 'sel' (of type struct dev_info).
00071  * Put matching devices in result list 'result'.
00072  */
00073 int devtag_dev_scan(struct dev_head *result, const struct devinfo_head *sel);
00074 
00075 /*
00076  * Find USB devices matching selections in list 'sel' (of type struct dev_info).
00077  * Put matching USB devices in result list 'result'.
00078  */
00079 int devtag_usb_scan(struct dev_head *result, const struct devinfo_head *sel);
